ing: 1 tablespoon orange-flavored liqueur, such as Cointreau Â®
des: "I created this one night to use up some summer strawberries and some of my basil.  What a refreshing and delicious summer drink!  I know it sounds unusual, but try it and see!"
ins: Combine the strawberries, tequila, orange-flavored liqueur, lemon juice, sugar, and basil leaves in a blender; mix on low until smooth. Add the ice and puree until the ice is crushed, 30 to 60 seconds.
